Name: CTERA
Author: CTERA Networks - support@ctera.com
Description:
The CTERA solution allows you to ingest and analyze events from CTERA Edge Filers in Microsoft Sentinel. This solution includes a data connector to collect syslog data from CTERA, analytic rules to detect suspicious activities, hunting queries for threat hunting, and a workbook for data visualization and analysis.

**Data Connectors:** 1, **Analytic Rules:** 2, **Hunting Queries:** 3, **Workbook:** 1

[Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)
